overview: When Rafa Benitez arrived in Liverpool three years ago few could have predicted the success he would bring to Anfield. A sensational run to the Champions League Final was the highlight of the manager's third season in charge, with the holders Barcelona beaten along the way. You can re-live every step along the road from Anfield to Athens, as well as the highlights from the clubs seventh European Cup Final. There's also highlights from every game - and every goal scored - in the Premiership, FA Cup, League Cup, and Community Shield, making this the complete record of another historic season at Liverpool.
title: Liverpool FC: Season Review 2006-2007
